content: समंजस {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Proper, reasonable, right, fit. {@--2@} Correct, true, accurate. {@--3@} Clear, intelligible; as in असमंजस, <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--4@} Virtuous, good, just; भृशाधिरूढस्य समंजसं जनं <ls>Ki. 14. 12.</ls> {@--5@} Practised, experienced. {@--6@} Healthy. --सं {@--1@} Propriety, fitness. {@--2@} Accuracy. {@--3@} Correct evidence.
